alert.note: Alert for Appling; Tattnall; Toombs; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:18PM EST until February 16 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Altamaha River At Baxley affecting Toombs, Tattnall, Wayne and Appling Counties. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Altamaha River At Baxley. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 74.5 feet, Flooding of agricultural and timber lands is expected. Deens Landing and Linton Carter Landing boat ramps, picnic areas and parking lots begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Sunday the stage was 74.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 74.9 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 74.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
